snippet: The channel, seeking to enhance its reputation for political conversation, is adding a two-hour show on Saturdays and Sundays to be hosted by Melissa Harris-Perry, a political science professor at Tulane.
abstract: The channel, seeking to enhance its reputation for political conversation, is adding a two-hour show on Saturdays and Sundays to be hosted by Melissa Harris-Perry, a political science professor at Tulane.
lead_paragraph: Continuing its makeover of the weekend mornings, MSNBC will add a talk show next month that will be hosted by Melissa Harris-Perry, a Tulane University professor of political science.

headline.main: MSNBC Adding Another Political Talk Show on Weekends
